modules.report
Class ReportRequestWorker

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.SwingWorker<java.lang.String,java.lang.Void>
      modules.report.ReportRequestWorker
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, java.util.concurrent.Future<java.lang.String>, java.util.concurrent.RunnableFuture<java.lang.String>
public class ReportRequestWorker
extends javax.swing.SwingWorker<java.lang.String,java.lang.Void>

A worker class for sending a report request to the UNIX server and displaying the results of the report request via the ReportViewer.

The sending of the request is performed as a background task since the UNIX server could take several minutes to come back with the results depending on the nature of the report request. Once the UNIX server sends the results of the report request, the results are loaded into the report viewer, which is operating on the current thread or event dispatch thread.

Connection information regarding the UNIX server should be obtained from the application.properties file

Author:
rterrell

Constructor Detail

ReportRequestWorker

public ReportRequestWorker(java.lang.String request,
                           ReportDetail rptInfo)
Created a ReportRequestWorker object which will initialize itself with UNIX server connection data obtained from the application.properties file.

This is when the UNIX server connection information is obtained. It is required that server name exist in the properties file as report.socket.serverName and the port number as report.socket.port.
